name: Highlight
description: Used to emphasize specific words or phrases within a larger body of text.
description_zh: 用于强调较大文本体中的特定单词或短语。

query.description: The query to highlight in the text
query.description_zh: 要在文本中突出显示的查询

ignoreCase.description: Whether to ignore case while matching
ignoreCase.description_zh: 匹配时是否忽略大小写

matchAll.description: Whether to match multiple instances of the query
matchAll.description_zh: 是否匹配查询的多个实例
